user.selectAllUsers: select * from credentials.user uu inner join credentials.user_authority ua on ua.id_user = uu.id inner join credentials.authority aa on aa.id = ua.id_authority where uu.enabled = true and ua.enabled = true
user.selectUserByUsername: select * from credentials.user uu inner join credentials.user_authority ua on ua.id_user = uu.id inner join credentials.authority aa on aa.id = ua.id_authority where uu.enabled = true and ua.enabled = true and uu.username = ?
user.insertUser: insert into credentials.user (username, password, enabled) values(?, ?, ?)
user.insertUserAndEnable: insert into credentials.user (username, password, enabled) values(?, ?, true)
user.enableUser: update credentials.user uu set enabled = true where uu.username = ?
user.disableUser: update credentials.user uu set enabled = false where uu.username = ?
user.updatePassword: update credentials.user uu set password = ? where uu.username = ?
user.updatePasswordAndEnabled: update credentials.user uu set password = ?, enabled = ? where uu.username = ?
user.countUsersWithUsername: select count(*) from credentials.user uu where uu.username = ?

authority.selectAuthorityByName: select * from credentials.authority aa where aa.authority_name = ?
authority.countAuthorityWithName: select count(*) from credentials.authority aa where aa.authority_name = ?
authority.updateUserAuthorityByUserAndName: update credentials.user_authority set enabled=? where id_user=(select id from credentials.user where username=?) and id_authority=(select id from credentials.authority where authority_name=?)
authority.insertUserAuthorityByUserAndName: insert into credentials.user_authority (id_user, id_authority, enabled) values((select id from credentials.user where username=?),(select id from credentials.authority where authority_name=?),?)
